title: Beef and ale stew with horseradish dumplings
description: Got a crowd to feed? This hearty dish is perfect and the oven does most of the work for you. For this recipe you will need a deep ovenproof casserole dish with a lid.
ingredients: 250g/9oz shallots or silverskin pickling onions, halved
salt and freshly ground black pepper
175g/6oz self-raising flour, plus extra for dusting
3-4 tbsp hot horseradish sauce, from a jar
